title: Blake Lively vs Justin Baldoni: $400 Million Lawsuit Explodes Into Hollywood's Messiest Feud
shortdescription: It Ends With Us drama turns nuclear – defamation, extortion, and Ryan Reynolds dragged in!
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: The behind-the-scenes war from It Ends With Us has officially escalated to a $400 million defamation and extortion lawsuit — with Blake Lively accusing Justin Baldoni of harassment, and Baldoni countersuing claiming a smear campaign orchestrated by Lively and Ryan Reynolds.
Leaked text messages, secretly recorded meetings, and allegations of blackmail have turned this into the ugliest Hollywood feud since Depp-Heard.
